txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Decorative Sword Sheaths from brigands, Orcs or Easterlings in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the decorative sword sheaths for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough decorative sword sheaths to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Decorative Sword Sheaths
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect decorative sword sheaths from brigands, Orcs, or Easterlings. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the decorative sword sheaths to any task-board in Great River.
You have accepted a task to acquire decorative sword sheaths.
Wanted: Decorative Sword Sheaths from brigands, Orcs or Easterlings in the Great River region.
